description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Electronics .

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Electronics .

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .

Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Electricity and Magnetism,
Resistors,
Capacitors,
Inductors,
Kirchhoff's Laws,
Diodes,
Transistors,
NPN and PNP Transistors,
Transistor Parameters,
Transistor Characteristics,
FET and JFET,
MOSFET,
Series and Parallel Circuits,
Number System and Digital Electronics,
Digital Logic Gates I,
Digital Logic Gates II,
Half Adder and Full Adder,
Formula Pack I,
Formula Pack II,
Measuring Instruments,
Circuit Symbols.

Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Basic Electronics,
Quiz on Diodes and Transistors Basics,
Quiz on Transistors,
Quiz on Number System and Digital Electronics,
Quiz on Formula Pack and Circuit Symbols.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
versionNote:
Updated tutorials and quizzes based on customer feedback.
Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
